title: API Geolocator Input Config Schema
comments: Schema for GeoView-API-geolocator input-query. The items inside parameters properties are the parameters provided by the URL.

parameters.description: Query parameter coming from the API call url (q, lang and keys).

q.description: The query to parse and send to supported API's.

lang.description: The language on wich to filter the query.

keys.description: The list of supported API key to query. Optional parameter, if missing, all supported key will be query.
